title: Official Release of FinTV
description: Welcome to FinTV. A sleek Jellyfin Client for LG TV. This Jellyfin Web Client is a project I've been working on for quite some time. I love the way the Apple TV app looks like and just wanted a cool looking client for Jellyfin. I've tried CSS stuff on the official Jellyfin App but that didn't do it for me. I hope you enjoy and like this client and use it a lot. Thank you!
